[http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Rift_Scuttler](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Rift_Scuttler)

"When affected by crowd control that **prevents** its movement, it loses 50 armor and magic resist permanently." (emphesis added)

To be fair, a taunt/charn or fear doesnt prevent movement. Taunts/Charm direct movement. Fears move randomly. This was probably done because the junglers with movement--preventing abilities have harder skills to land in early ganks, giving them a little bit of extra gold quicker early.

EDIT - now that i think about it, my last statement is not really true (J4 and VI). but its true for tank junglers.
